com.sap.spe.pricing.transactiondata

Interface IPricingDocumentCommon

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPricingDocument, IPricingDocumentSAPExit, IPricingDocumentUserExit

    public interface IPricingDocumentCommon
    The pricing document contains accumulated pricing information of all pricing items and provides methods which are processing all pricing items. This interface contains all methods which are accessable in SPE-userexits and in the IPricingDocument-interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        my Id. The Id corresponds to the R/3-databasefield KONV-KNUMV

      • getNetValue

        ICurrencyValue getNetValue()
        Returns:
        the netvalue of the whole document, which is a sum of the netvalue of the items.

      • getTaxValue

        ICurrencyValue getTaxValue()
        Returns:
        the taxvalue of the whole document.

      • getFreight

        ICurrencyValue getFreight()
        Returns:
        the freight value of the whole document.

      • getNetValueWithoutFreight

        ICurrencyValue getNetValueWithoutFreight()
        Returns:
        the net value without freight of the whole document.

      • getSubtotal

        ICurrencyValue getSubtotal(char subtotalFlag)
        Parameters:
        subtotalFlag - the subtotal flag (@see com.sap.spe.pricing.customizing.application.PricingCustomizingConstants#ConditionSubtotal)
        Returns:
        the subtotal value of the whole document.

      • getPricingProcedure

        Returns:
        my pricing procedure.

      • getZeroValuesForExclusionFlag

        boolean getZeroValuesForExclusionFlag()
        Returns:
        the flag which specifies if pricing condition with zero values should be taken into account for the exclusion group logic.

      • setZeroValuesForExclusionFlag

        void setZeroValuesForExclusionFlag(boolean flag)
        Set the flag which specifies if pricing condition with zero values should be taken into account for the exclusion group logic.

      • getTryDirectCurrencyConversionFlag

        boolean getTryDirectCurrencyConversionFlag()
        Returns:
        the flag which specifies if the currency conversion should be done directly between condition record currency and document currency or from condition record currency to local currency to document currency.

      • setTryDirectCurrencyConversionFlag

        void setTryDirectCurrencyConversionFlag(boolean flag)
        Set the flag which specifies how the currency conversion should be performed.

      • getTakeCurrencyConversionFlagIntoAccount

        boolean getTakeCurrencyConversionFlagIntoAccount()
        Returns:
        the flag which specifies if the currency conversion flag in the customizing of the condition type should be taken into account.

      • setTakeCurrencyConversionFlagIntoAccount

        void setTakeCurrencyConversionFlagIntoAccount(boolean flag)
        Set the flag which specifies if the currency conversion flag in the customizing of the condition type should be taken into account.

      • setObjectForUserExits

        java.lang.Object setObjectForUserExits(java.lang.String key,
                                       java.lang.Object obj)
        This method can be used to store objects in the userexits. To remove a key, set the parameter obj to null.

      • getObjectForUserExits

        java.lang.Object getObjectForUserExits(java.lang.String key)
        This method can be used to retrieve objects.

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(IPricingDocumentObserver observer)

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(IPricingDocumentObserver observer)

      • isPartialProcessing

        boolean isPartialProcessing()
        Returns:
        the partial processing flag of the (sales) document. The partial processing flag contains information about if all documents lineitems are processed or not.

      • getAuthorityForDisplay

        int getAuthorityForDisplay()
        Returns:
        the authority level the user has to display this document's conditions.

      • getAuthorityForEdit

        int getAuthorityForEdit()
        Returns:
        the authority level the user has to edit this document's conditions.

      • isZeroPriceActive

        boolean isZeroPriceActive()
        Returns:
        the flag if prices with the rate 0 are set to inactive.

      • setZeroPriceActive

        void setZeroPriceActive(boolean isActive)

      • setStatusMessage

        void setStatusMessage(StatusEvent event)
        Signals an instance of StatusEvent to my status listeners by invoking their setStatusMessage() method.
        Parameters:

      • clearStatusMessage

        void clearStatusMessage(StatusEvent event)
        Signals an instance of StatusEvent to my status listeners by invoking their clearStatusMessage() method.
        Parameters:
        event - the StatusEvent to be signaled

      • isReturnDocument

        boolean isReturnDocument()
        to check whether return document indicator is set at the document(header) level or not
        Returns:
        true if return falg is set at header level otherwise returns false

      • isLeanDocument

        boolean isLeanDocument()
        to check whether this document is a 'lean document' or not. Lean document is used for interactive configuration in decoupled pricing and configuration scenario.
        Returns:
        TRUE if it is a lean document otherwise FALSE
